Franklin Adreon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franklin_Adreon 0 Franklin "Pete" Adreon (November 18, 1902 – September 10, 1979) was an American film and television director, producer, screenwriter, and actor. Franklin_"_Pete_"_Adreon ( November_18_,_1902 – September_10_,_1979 ) was an_American_film_and_television_director , producer , screenwriter , and actor .
